scripts.content: (e=>{e.loadPackage("js/embla-carousel.umd.js").then(()=>{const r=e.EmblaCarousel,o=document.getElementById("about_awards"),l=o?.querySelector(".embla"),t=o?.querySelectorAll(".embla_navigation_button"),a=o?.querySelector(".dots"),c=r(l,{loop:!1});c.scrollSnapList().forEach((e,r)=>{const o=document.createElement("button");o.className="group flex items-center justify-center w-4 h-4 rounded-full border border-gray-600 hover:border-gray-500";const l=document.createElement("span");l.className="w-1 h-1 rounded-full bg-gray-600 group-hover:bg-gray-500",o.appendChild(l),o.ariaLabel=`team-${r}`,o.addEventListener("click",()=>c.scrollTo(r)),a?.appendChild(o)}),t?.forEach(e=>{const r=e;r.addEventListener("click",()=>"previous"===r?.dataset?.action?c.scrollPrev():c.scrollNext())});const s=()=>{t?.forEach(e=>{const r=e;r.disabled="previous"===r?.dataset?.action?!c.canScrollPrev():!c.canScrollNext()});const e=c.selectedScrollSnap();a?.querySelectorAll("button")?.forEach((r,o)=>{const l=r.querySelector("span");l&&(o===e?(r.className="group flex items-center justify-center w-4 h-4 rounded-full border-4 border-black",r.style.borderWidth="4px",r.style.borderColor="#000",l.className="w-1 h-1 rounded-full bg-black"):(r.className="group flex items-center justify-center w-4 h-4 rounded-full border border-gray-600 hover:border-gray-500",r.style.borderWidth="1px",l.className="w-1 h-1 rounded-full bg-gray-600 group-hover:bg-gray-500"))})};c.on("select",s),c.on("reInit",s),s()}).catch(e=>{console.log({err:e})})})(window);
